channel.title: How to make a SAFE ZONE a NOT SAFE ZONE

item.title: How to make a SAFE ZONE a NOT SAFE ZONE
item.dc:creator: @mod1 mod
item.description:
@mod1 wrote:

what ur looking for is this
Server Base: Any pimpscape related source

Classes Modified: client.java

Procedure
Step 1: Open up Client.JAVA and search

public boolean nonWild() {

Step 2: Youl see somthing like this if you use pimpscape or somthing like it

[code]
public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else

return false;
}[/code]
Step 3: Ok go to the line where all those coords are and scroll where they end and add thisi]

(absX >= COORDS && absX <= COORDS && absY >= COORDS && absY <= COORDS)||

Step 4:Ok puting on the coords involves you knowing the grid in runescape(regions)if you want to get these coords go on yourserver or any server and type this clientside command

::coordson

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a SAFE ZONE a NOT SAFE ZONE
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

under client.java search

Public Boolean Nonwild

It’s a long list, find the general coordinates for the area you want to make a danger zone, i.e., if i wanted to my ::range a danger zone, i would find the coordinates and erase them from the list. back up your server before trying though incase you mess up
